text: jinsillo seongseoui salamdeul jung-eneun hananimgwa geudaedeul-ege naelyeojin geosgwa geudeul-ege naelyeojin geos-eul midneun jadeul-i iss-euni hananim-eul wihae jasin-eul najchumyeonseo hananim-ui jingpyodeullosseo hachanh-eun iig-eul chaeng-giji anhneun jadeul-ila. geuleohan jadeul-egeneun sillo geudeul-ui bosang-i geudeul-ui junimkke issnola. sillo hananimkkeseoneun gyesanham-e gajang ppaleusin bun-ila
